page.title: 14Crimple Beck
page.content: In Crimple Beck there is abundant wildlife,{Frogs,Toads,Newts,Trout and {Eels,}whilst{Ducks}and{Moorhens}are also attracted. The damp banks and surrounding woodland are ideal for{wild flowers } such as{Angelica,Marsh Marigold}with its strikig foliage and flowers and meadow sweet,whilst the air is scented with{Water Mint}and{Wood Garlic.} Bordering the edges of the water are {Marsh Bedstraw}with its smooth stem requiring support from other plants, {Yellow Flag Iris,Creeping Jenny}and {Marsh Valerian. Early in Spring{Wild Daffodil, {Celendine, Primrose and Snowdrops} appear as well as most of the common wild flowers. Butterflies, moths and insects are in great quantities
